entry.title: By the Numbers
entry.content:
1 Morning spent cycling on the runway of Quito’s old airport.

1 Church (Catholic), ascended by foot all the way to the bell tower.

2 Cold springs swum in.

4 Ominous stomach rumblings (between the two of us), signaling that our choice of restaurant was perhaps not the most sound.

Infinite Discussions about finally signing up for a salsa dancing class.

We’ve taken advantage of minor illness and general busy-ness to stick close to our home base and explore Quito. Hopefully soon we’ll venture a little further outside the city but it’s been a treat to explore all the churches, outdoor activities, and pastries Quito has to offer.
